oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Kid Rock's Rock n Roll Revival Tour at the Sommet Center
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Kid Rock (Rapper); Woodcuts (prints);Show tents; Split Fountain Printing; Concert tours;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and brown on white) announcing Kid Rock's on the Rock and Roll Revival Tour at the Bridgestone Arena (formerly the Sommet Center) on February 29. Poster features woodcuts of a show tent and a singer.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Brad Vetter
